TopicTitle: just an inquiry Re: Steam and mods

Articles.Content:
Bear with me for asking this, I haven't played for months now and I just want to clarify things before installing my mods again. Do auto-updates of KSP on Steam still overwrite or erase mod files in the GameData folder? If so, then is it still recommended that I make a copy of the KSP folder that's found in the Steam directory to prevent that from happening?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-22T11:12:48Z" title="07/22/2015 11:12  AM" data-short="8 yr">July 22, 2015</time> by Spark Plug**
  
solved
Pretty sure that the update won't touch the mods. Still a good idea to make a backup just in case though.
Only if it the mod changes one of Squad's files.
That said auto-updates can break mods, so you want to have your copy of KSP outside Steam's folder anyway if you don't want to be locked out of your save for a few days after every update.
